Panel FMOLS/DOLS command for Stata

01 Jan 2018

Pedroni’s 1996 paper models panel FMOLS estimators as a simple average between each panel’s FMOLS for coefficients and sum divided by the square root of the total number of panels for t-statistics.

There already exists a tool for time series FMOLS estimation called cointreg written by Qunyong Wang and Na Wu.

Meet a new command for Stata xtcointreg that applies group mean averaging to it.

You need to install cointreg first. The documentation is the same as cointreg plus one option full. The package can be installed using ssc install xtcointreg.

Update: If you have installed the program successfully but it is not working for some reason, please try this workaround:

  1. write a command which xtcointreg and find the location of the xtcointreg.ado file;
  2. open that file with any text editor and remove the line number 8 capt program drop xtcointreg;
  3. save the file and try to run xtcointreg again. This problem is related to the publisher of the code and not to my code itself.
